lines.text: Or just changed their memory, but we could try and beat them at the only hint that they've potentially given us and go investigate that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could sit and cast a truth spell with Ludinus and just try and have a frank conversation with the understanding that we both get to ask questions, and sometimes that answer's going to be "I'm not comfortable answering that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if he would agree to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we're okay with him occasionally saying, "I'm not going to answer that," for whatever that's worth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't see him agreeing to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or if he did, he would just pass on the questions that he doesn't want to answer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we would know that when he is being forthright, he's being forthright.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if they did alter memories or pay them off or do something, maybe someone saw something and can tell us something, I dunno.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think everyone has to drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instead it ends in a humble if somewhat creepy single-story building of rustic, weathered wood, and a tiled roof decorated with numerous brass and iron chimes, wind instruments, and charms dangling from the edges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The interior itself is-- I'm trying to find the proper--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the name? The Cultivated--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the owl look like? Does it look like fucking Thaddeus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that you give a side-eye to every owl we ever meet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine, it's an owl, it's not Thaddeus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it was, that'd be hilarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rats start squeaking, just, you know, acknowledging the arrival of something strange and new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a femur that has been made into some sort of a flute-like instrument.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the birds and creatures start getting louder and louder, You can see, on the opposite end, a curtain that pulls to the side, and a figure comes out, and as it does, they all get quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, Keona, we are first-time purveyors of your establishment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Martinet Lu-- he sent us. He sends his regards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said you might have some potions and fancy magicky things for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We just might." She puts her arms out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do her hands look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're thin, and the nails themselves extend--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there little paintings on each of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not, but it's just different and strange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Times have been busy, so we're a bit plucked clean, but..."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh." She starts putting away a small satchel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to talk about potions and diamonds, but what is this? I'm going to pick up the femur and show it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just drawing her in my book, like-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches out and takes it, the fingers (slurping) wrap around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know the death whistle sound?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much audible damage to we take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) And hands it back to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What else do you got? This is exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a potion of healing, two potions of greater healing, and a potion of superior healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And no diamonds, I assume, either.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all right, just not great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh! Do you have a fancy bowl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What kind of bowl are you looking for? "And diamonds I can also acquire, "though I may have to remove them from their setting, "depending on how expensive you're looking?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What other-- you seem to have taste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just curious if you got anything else so impressive just hanging around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, have you got some time, then?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ha! Most aroused Caduceus has ever been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are prices as a friend of Ludinus'."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Crusty gems on a bowl? "To what worth are you looking for?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not have that at the moment, "but if you give me a couple days, "I can probably procure something similar."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I want to see what else you got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're unhappy with something, you throw it at it, "and it becomes not a problem for a short time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's with, like, the friend deal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any gemstones? Do you have any amber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lets them cascade onto the table in front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you have a 350 gold piece diamond, or a 500 gold piece diamond, or one of each, we would happily take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little rough, but it'll work for any sort of, you know, material component elements you require.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know you've got platinum, nevermind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And this is the-- "this is the interesting one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, if we put it, like, some on me and some on Nott, and then we stood next to each other, we went to permanently be together forever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you wait the minute for it to set, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A minute for it to set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any way that-- to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are some other magical solvents, "like a universal solvent could perhaps remove it, "or an oil of etherealness to lose the physicality "of one such object, and there's always a wish."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It takes a minute to set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But any strength and it won't be able to pull it apart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's only two ounces, so it's two uses, "but it'll run you, for the entire jar, 600 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All my money's going to be gone, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just pay for the whole thing myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can put in 200 for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, get those fingers away from me! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't know what we'll use it for, but it'll be fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll present itself. It'll be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You in particular were interested "in some of my other personal creations?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have-- you like making musical instruments, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well that is one thing I pass my time with, yes."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have a harp? (Marisha laughing)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What can you make it out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over across the table at all the intricately carved bones that she has laid out and goes, "Out of with that." She points to-- there's a large oxen skull with a big set of curved horns that loop around the back of it, and she points to one of the large horns coming out of the side of the skull.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's actually exactly what I was hoping you could make it out of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It may take a couple days, but I can do it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I guess you're making-- you're coming back for the bowl, or?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say put the order in, because there's some back and forth and we should take a couple days to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if we're buying the gem-crusted bowl, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if I were to give--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's, like, all I'm rolling lately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, what is happening with my dice, y'all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got whole generations of the families of dice over there, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I keep this one here, or should I just switch--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's gerrymandering going on in your portion of the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take you to the oldest church in Los Angeles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tonight is a full moon. Maybe after the game--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You need to bathe them in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The house of representatives building under the desk.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you charge for adding runes or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't make creations without adorning them with art."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Any flair that you think of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you would like to commission this bowl as well?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody want to help me, it would help all of us for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll throw in a little bit for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is my favorite person I've met in the city so far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to help, because--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is this like an upfront thing? Or like pay when--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll give her 50 platinum right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give her, oh, that's half.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we'll cover the other half when it's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two days, two days, I should have "all of this ready for you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Got a harp here, got some bracers over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still waiting for you in Rosohna to pick up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been about 10 weeks, which is how long the commission was going to take.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I thought you were talking about the stealthy-- I was like, "I think it's been a little bit more time."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Show up, he's like, "I haven't even started." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that all you need from me?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She did that, but her arms reached around, touched her ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, a hand was out here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys exit back into the alleyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were we supposed to be-- jade, jade, jade?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we supposed to be looking for jade?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone wanted us to find something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dice rattling) What do we need to accomplish?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could go check the archive site.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we could go to that place if it's-- oh no, it's far away, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Rexxentrum, Pride's Call is roughly 200 miles away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If only we could get there faster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All the cards on, some cards on the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that he's concealing stuff from us already.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just don't know what he's concealing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, so why would he ever agree to that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would also be under it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, but it does convey a certain sense of understood distrust, and I don't know if that's entirely what we want to do in this position.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we go back to him and say, "We don't believe you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't trust you for shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if they had been a little bit more honest, maybe we would've.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but they don't know we know that they were not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, that's why I want to ask! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree with Fjord, I'm not sure what going back to these people who are trying to use us, and asking them how they're using us, is going to help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a unquenchable hope that we can find one ally in this mess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I don't know any other way to do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could certainly ask in the morning, before we had out to Pride's Call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wasn't there another mission that we were also--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were offered a job from Pumat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did he want us to find?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we should've asked Crazy Creepy Fingers if she needed anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go back in and ask her!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk back in and knock on the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything that you need procured or found or sussed out? We happen to be very handy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could you procure me some Pride silk?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you be needing the silkworms, or would you need us to extract their silk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I never milked a silkworm before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This would not be an easy task."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, if you can procure a worm for me, "I'll take three."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long have you been in Rexxentrum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm what you would call the odd duck in the family."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, I'm going to let Eyes of the Grave roll for a second in this room, just to give a little peek around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm relieved and disappointed at the same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I hope when we see you next, we come bearing gifts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Toodle-oo! It is just as creepy the second time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean? In what way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm always impressed by someone who's like, scrapbooking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know somebody with long fingers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if she's from Xhorhas.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe I'll ask her when we come back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we can acquire three silkworms from near Pride's Call, she'll give us 500 gold per worm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they must be really hard to kill, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: History check for both of you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or they're the size of horses.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was going to say, they're probably huge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only a handful of families procure it, and they guard those silkworms, which, by the way, are about the size of a fist, like they are the goose that laid the golden egg, because in a lot of ways, they are, and a lot of people outside that try and take them disappear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So a few families from that region got it on lock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is like horse theft, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it the law, or is it more of a suggestion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, what are we trying to find there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, they said that there was an archeological dig.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's where they found the beacon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems like an awful lot of work to prove that we already know that they're lying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to find your friend Astrid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She did say to meet her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could at least swing by and see if she's home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, that also feels like a trap though, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she doesn't know who we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now Trent already knows we're here, it's not like he's going to like, suddenly surprise us when we get to her house or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to see her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to go over there a big group of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, just a couple, then? Just to spy a little bit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just stay outside, if you wanted to check in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to make sure you're safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and I could turn invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't want to poke that nest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we enter a fighting tournament? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does such a thing exist in this town?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A couple days to maybe burn some spells, prepare, see what I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can take downtime. You don't have to like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Couple days of just downtime might just be a good thing to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a public one here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to take some downtime to inquire about like any underground fight rings, you can definitely take that as part of your downtime activity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, okay, totally into fight club, but also if we're taking a few days, whether we know they're lying out their fucking asses or not, right, it still seems like we should try to find more information, right? Like something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how or what or why.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could check in on the temple and see how the investigation is going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could check back in. I haven't really spent any amount of real time with the Cobalt Soul here in Rexxentrum, so I could check in with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean? They don't want what the Cerberus Assembly knows to be public knowledge?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know if the Cobalt Soul has ever interfered at a high level with the Cerberus Assembly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know if the (mumbling)? I feel like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dairon has mentioned something like this to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dairon has, just roll a history check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're honestly just wasting two days, why don't we just go to the Bright Queen now, and then come back in two days?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may not be able to come back in two days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why not? We can teleport whenever we want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The little moon? The moon is a symbol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very much a relationship of frustrated convenience at times, and other times very much a subversive antagonism.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, the thing that first started getting me on board with the Cobalt Soul was when they were like, "Yeah, we root out corruption "in places like the government and Cerberus Assembly," and then I was like, "Whoa, but aren't you, "like, an organization, and aren't all organizations "prone to, like, corruption?" And they were like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know, a recent historical event in which the Cobalt Soul was responsible for rooting out illegal, magical experimentations that a member of the Cerberus Assembly was accomplishing about 25, 26 years ago, by the name of Dr. Anna Ripley, who was then ousted from the Assembly and escaped punishment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anna Ripley was in the Assembly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's been mentioned at this table before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it was the Cobalt Soul that uncovered her necromantic experimentation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this like weird fucking vampirey woman, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were saying about a two day wait?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm fine to just wait two days, but if we're not going to do anything, why don't we just go to talk to the Bright Queen now, and come back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because we need to be here for two days so that I can split off on my own and go to, without telling any of you, 31st Wodestone Manor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also want to cast Commune every day for-- I have a few questions, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll take a week to gather your thoughts on the things you want to achieve when we come back next Thursday.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please train me to be a badass fighter in underground basement clubs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry about the mix-up there about the Ripley-Delilah thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She worked with the Dwendalian Empire and was ousted for illegal experimentation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They met in Port Damali after both escaping their own, like, at separate times--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anna had her own knock off list, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: King Dwendal was on her list.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, that's right, I remember that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how they met in Port Damali and aligned themselves, they were like, "Fuck the Empire, fuck these people, "we got skills, let's work together."
